FuncDef:
The mpls rsvp-te bfd all-interfaces enable command enables BFD for RSVP globally. The command enables the capability of creating BFD sessions on all interfaces that are not blocked from BFD for RSVP.
The undo mpls rsvp-te bfd all-interfaces enable command disables BFD for RSVP.
By default, BFD for RSVP is disabled.
CLIs: undo mpls rsvp-te bfd all-interfaces enable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable BFD for RSVP on multiple RSVP-enabled interfaces on a node, run the mpls rsvp-te bfd all-interfaces enable command to enable BFD for RSVP globally. This command helps rapidly configure BFD for RSVP.
Prerequisites
BFD has been enabled globally.RSVP-TE has been enabled on interfaces and the node.

Follow-up Procedure
To disable BFD for RSVP on a specific interface, run the mpls rsvp-te bfd block command on that interface.
